question: Which of the following was the court-poet of Yasovarman?
explanation: Gaudavaho is written in Prakrit which enlists the achievements of Yasovarman. Vakpatiraja was the court poet of Yasovarman. According to Gaudavaho, Yasovarman passed through the valley of the Son, reached the Vindhya mountain, defeated and killed the King of Magadha, conquered the King of Vanga, and reached the eastern sea-shore.
